type: Tutorial Step - Why Is It Blank?

definition.text: Woohoo, you did it! You have added your first custom chart. Let's see what we've got so far. Zoom all the way into your chart and take a look around.

paragraphs.text: Your chart is there alright, but it's pretty boring still.
Find the Layer Manager for the Timeline Chart you added. Use your mouse to scroll a few times.
No matter how hard you scroll nothing happens does it? Don't worry, nothing is broken! We just haven’t hooked it up to any of your data. Let’s change that!
A Layer Manager inherits the name from its Timeline Chart. That's why a short name was best!
